Registering eSQLManager ( help index )
Registering eSQLManager

After receiving you payment for the eSQLManager Pro license, a registration key will be send to you by e-mail. This registration key is determined by the username and e-mail address which you specified when placing the order for the license. You`ll receive two different keys:

- Challenge Key
- Registration Key

Open the registration dialog, if not already open. Go to the menu help and select the "Enter registration details...". Now enter your username and e-mail address as provided in the e-mail send to you by Errorsoft. The challenge key received in the e-mail should match with the challenge key displayed in the Registration dialog after entering your username and e-mail address. The registration key is the key needed to unlock the software.



When the challenge key received from Errorsoft matches the challenge key in the Registration dialog, enter the registration key and press the "Register" button to unlock the software.

You are now ready to use eSQLManager Pro!
